name: Operation: Rogue Dungeon
description:
Invade the dungeon as a soldier! Your real-time shooting meets the turn-based dungeon inhabitants in a battle to the permadeath! Conserve your ammunition and balance the guns you carry as you traverse the trap- and monster-infested dungeon!

This is Operation: Rogue Dungeon!!!

  • 8 different guns to find and use
  • 9 depths of randomly generated dungeons
  • Real-time top-down shooting
  • Enemies and traps move along the beat
  • Collect treasure and potions

Part of the 2023 7DRL challenge.
